Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: It can  provide very generalized feedback on my writing and code, it has no context in to what we are trying to achieve according to our subject outlines ect, however our teach will provide very specific feedback on the task and how we should improve our understanding.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: yes, its a bit hard to trust an AI to criticise your work and you may not feel motivated to improve on such generalized feedback.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI will not beable to understand your current knowledge of the topic and beable to build from there.
